EmailTemplate.description: To notify Orientation Staff that a unit has been tagged and to call the customer for add-ons
EmailTemplate.name: Whitefish Orientation Add On Call
EmailTemplate.subject: Orientation Specialist Add-On Call
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,,
This is to let you know that {!Account.Name} 's package has been tagged. Please call the customer to offer them any add-on parts before their package is brought into the shop to be built. Once the call is complete, please create the Work Order.
Thank you
